name: The Path (itch) (Matt_Vasquez)
description:
Created By Matt Vasquez

Game Methodology Final

The Path is a point and click thriller/mystery game with multiple endings, the player will need to play the game multiple times to unlock the full story. (There is also a secret ending)

The player just got out of work and is heading to their quiet, cabin home. But something lurks in the shadows of the forest, hunting you...

I plan to make a sequel someday, something much better than this obviously. But I'd hope to use this as the epilogue for a better game to come.
